title: Why is my music player stopping automatically? - Quora

response.answer_text: I don’t know exactly what music player but you may be using a faulty music player. You may want to go back to google play and search for another music player or use the one linked below. I guess you can try out this one: Music Player - play mp3, music, podcasts, audio - Apps on Google Play It has no bugs and it runs pretty smoothly. I hope I answered you question.

If your device is android and your music player is default system app then your device needs an update. Or you can Install Google Play Music app from play store to play your music. If you face issue with one single song it would be an issue with download, not complete file.
